title: League of Legends Vision Score Data Analysis
description: Analyzed 1M+ professional games to evaluate how vision score influences competitive success in League of Legends. Used univariate and bivariate analysis, hypothesis testing, and predictive modeling to assess vision metrics.

title: Project 1: Expository Visualization â€“ Grocery Store Foods
description: Designed a static visualization communicating insights about food processing across Walmart, Target, and Whole Foods. Used data transformation and visual design rationale to argue a focused takeaway.

title: Project 2: Persuasive/Deceptive Visualization
description: Created opposing visual narratives using a controversial dataset to explore the ethical line between persuasive and deceptive design. Included annotation, transformation, and rationale in a deployed HTML report.

title: Taylor Swift Song Recommender
description: Developed a music recommendation tool using Python and Spotify data. Featured keyword analysis and dynamic filtering by song attributes.

title: Bluetooth Speaker From Scratch
description: Built a custom Bluetooth speaker including PCB soldering, enclosure design via laser cutting, and troubleshooting electronics collaboratively.

title: Kaggle Jane Street Market Prediction
description: Worked with real-time financial data to develop predictive models. Applied feature engineering and tuned ML algorithms using Pandas and NumPy.

title: Data Structures Visualizer
description: Created an interactive web app that visualizes stack, queue, and tree operations to help students understand data structures.

title: NeuroTech Brain Map Interface
description: Collaborated with Voytek Lab to build a web tool using PyCortex for visualizing brain regions from multi-modal brain maps.

title: Food Processing Bias Report
description: Investigated bias in ultra-processed food listings across retailers using NOVA classification. Visualized pricing vs. nutritional quality trends.

title: Chess Endgame Classifier
description: Built a classifier that predicts endgame outcomes using FEN notation and board state features.

title: Resume Website Portfolio
description: Designed and deployed a personal portfolio site using templated HTML, CSS Grid, and JS data loading from JSON.

title: Fictional Data Storytelling Project
description: Created a fictional dataset and told a visual story using statistical design to engage and inform through an interactive notebook.
